CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the three copolymers PDTP-BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT were studied by fabricating bulk heterojunction BHJ - type PSCs with a conventional sandwich configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC 70 BM / Ca / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PC 70 BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| PC 70 BM |

The following entities were removed:

* ITO (not a material name)
* PEDOT (not a material name)
* PSS (not a material name)
* Ca (not a material name)
* Al (not a material name)

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the three copolymers PDTP-BT , PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT were studied by fabricating bulk heterojunction BHJ - type PSCs with a conventional sandwich configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC 70 BM / Ca / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |

| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |

| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC 70 BM |
| Ca |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

The entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" are:

* ITO
* PEDOT : PSS
* PC 70 BM
* Ca
* Al

These entities are not directly related to the material properties of the copolymers, but rather to the components used in the fabrication of the bulk heterojunction BHJ-type PSCs.
